en:
受伤
(Shòushāng)

Injured

Definitions of 受伤
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

verb
    be injured
        受伤, 受害, 带伤, 瘏, 受伤害
    be wounded
        受伤, 带伤
    suffer injury
        受害, 受伤
    feel hurt
        受伤, 愠
